name: Ntwala Island Lodge

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: First impressions not great. Landed on a bumpy gravel airstrip hewn out of scrub, and had to climb into the back of a decripit old ute pickup with seats in the back for the first part of our transfer.
reviews.title: Nice, but not really African and details let it down

description: Ntwala Island Lodge is an ultra-luxury lodge on a wonderfully pristine and secluded island where white sands and palm trees add to the romance, and belie the fact that this lodge is in Africa. The lodge comprises only four sumptuous suites, including a private plunge pool and viewing deck as well as an indoor and outdoor shower.
